    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Discusión y resolución de sistemas de ecuaciones lineales</string>
            <string language="en">Discussion and solution of systems of linear equations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diskussion und Lösung der Systeme der linearen 
Gleichungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Discussion et solution des systèmes des 
équations linéaires</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Discussão e solução dos sistemas de equações 
lineares</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Discussione e soluzione dei sistemi delle 
equazioni lineari</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συζήτηση και λύση των συστημάτων των γραμμικών 
εξισώσεων</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones la resolución y discusión de sistemas de ecuaciones lineales. Se estudia el teorema de Rouché-Fröbenius y la regla de Cramer.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to solve and discuss systems of linear equations. It studies the Rouché-Fröbenius theorem and Cramer's rule.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">teorema de Rouché-Fröbenius</string>
            <string language="en">Rouché-Fröbenius theorem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">sistemas</string>
            <string language="en">systems</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">discusión</string>
            <string language="en">discussion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ecuaciones lineales</string>
            <string language="en">linear equations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">regla de Cramer</string>
            <string language="en">Cramer's rule</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, Systeme der linearen Gleichungen zu lösen und zu 
behandeln. Sie studiert das Rouché-Fröbenius Theorem und 
Richtlinie Cramers.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations de résoudre et discuter des systèmes des équations 
linéaires. Elle étudie le théorème de Rouché-Fröbenius et 
la règle de Cramer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações resolver e
discutir sistemas de equações lineares. Estuda o theorem de 
Rouché-Fröbenius e a régua de Cramer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
risolvere e discutere i sistemi delle equazioni lineari. Studia 
il teorema di Rouché-Fröbenius e la regola del Cramer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να λύσει και να συζητήσει τα συστήματα των γραμμικών 
εξισώσεων. Μελετά το θεώρημα ροuθχ3ε- Frφbenius και τον 
κανόνα Cramer.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rouché-Fröbenius Theorem</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Systeme</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
